00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00033   * @{
00034   */
00035 
00036 /** @addtogroup NVIC_Examples NVIC
00037   * @{
00038   */
00039 
00040 /** @addtogroup Disable_Interrupt
00041   * @{
00042   */
00043 
00044 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 void NVIC_Configuration(void);
00046 void BFTM_Configuration(void);
00047 
00048 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00050   * @brief  Main program.
00051   * @retval None
00052   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00053 int main(void)
00054 {
00055 
00056   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00057   HT32F_DVB_PBInit(BUTTON_KEY1, BUTTON_MODE_GPIO);
00058   BFTM_Configuration();
00059 
00060   while (1)
00061   {
00062     if (HT32F_DVB_PBGetState(BUTTON_KEY1) == RESET)
00063     {
00064       __disable_irq();
00065     }
00066     else
00067     {
00068       __enable_irq();
00069     }
00070   }
00071 }
00072 
00073 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00074   * @brief  BFTM Configuration.
00075   * @retval None
00076   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00077 void BFTM_Configuration(void)
00078 {
00079   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00080     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00081     CKCUClock.Bit.BFTM0      = 1;
00082     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00083   }
00084 
00085   BFTM_SetCompare(HT_BFTM0, LIBCFG_MAX_SPEED);
00086   BFTM_IntConfig(HT_BFTM0, ENABLE);
00087   BFTM_SetCounter(HT_BFTM0, 0);
00088   BFTM_EnaCmd(HT_BFTM0, ENABLE);
00089 
00090   NVIC_EnableIRQ(BFTM0_IRQn);
00091 }
00092 
00093 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00094 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00095   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00096   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00097   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00098   * @retval None
00099   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00100 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00101 {
00102   /*
00103      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00104      Debug message can be added here.
00105      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00106   */
00107 
00108   while (1)
00109   {
00110   }
00111 }
00112 #endif
